effects: Increase physical damage against Demons by 75%
Increase physical damage against Machinas by 75%
Increase physical damage against Reapers by 75%
name: Soulless Hammer
Soulless Hammer
給無魂者的鐵槌
영혼없는 자의 철퇴
Marteau des sansâmes
Hammer für die Seelenlosen
Martillazo a los desalmados
desc_short: Boost physical damage against demon, machina, and reaper monsters
物理攻擊時提高對惡魔機械死靈系魔物的傷害
물리공격 시 악마형, 기계형, 사령형 마물에게 주는 피해량 상승
Dégâts physiques accrus contre les monstres de type démon, machine et mort-vivant
Erhöht phys. Schaden gegen Dämonen, Maschinen und Untote.
Aumenta el daño físico contra demonios, máquinas y muertos vivientes
